name: Cock-A-Doodle Crossing
description:
This is my remake of "Freeway" an atari 2600 game designed in 1981 by David Crane.

In this game you have 6 tries to get as many chickens across the road as possible.

Every time you get hit by traffic, you lose a try, so be careful chickens have feelings too! 

The controls are simply up and down arrows on your keyboard.

When all your tries are used, the level will end and tally up your score. If you get a High score, it will be saved in the main menu under " HighScores" button.
